name: Dedication Discussion
description:
Welcome, friend!

To the world of dedication and unique parkour!

---

Controls:

Any Keyboard Key    -    Open Menu

Left Click                        -     Push Away from point

Right Click                     -     Pull Towards point 

Middle Click                 -     Reset Level
